title: Improved Pod Failure Recovery
summary: Adds enhanced error handling and recovery strategies for pod failures, including retry logic and fallback options.

title: Enhance API Gateway for Multi-Cluster Support
summary: Updates the API gateway to support seamless integration and management across multiple Kubernetes clusters.

title: Update API Documentation for External Service Integrations
summary: Improve the API documentation to offer detailed guidance on integrating external services with Kubernetes, featuring examples, common use cases, and troubleshooting advice.

title: Third-Party Service Integration Tests
summary: Implements a series of tests to ensure seamless integration of Kubernetes with third-party cloud services.
